Keywords: Council of Kangs , Future , Past , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Nathaniel Richards
Special Powers
MASTER OF TIME: When Kang the Conqueror hits, give him a Time token. // FREE: For each of Kang the Conqueror's Time tokens, choose a distinct combat value and modify that value +1 until your next turn. // FREE: Remove up to 3 Time tokens. If you did, heal Kang the Conqueror that many clicks.

Comments
December 27, 2022
SuperClixer
With his low printed defense values, you can merely attack him before he attacks any of your figures, so you can kill him, before he can get tokens that he could use to modify his defense values. I do not feel Legacy Cards that do not have a SP that boosts combat values from the start, and without you having to do something to get that boost, appealing or worth the cost of buying the Card, or the figure, if you do not have it.
November 6, 2022
hoojeebo
When he hits (any number of characters), he gets a token.
November 5, 2022
Batcow
Does he get a token for each character hit? Or just one token regardless of how many characters were hit?
October 24, 2022
pokolo
The time token shenanigans are cool… I wish he had some improved targeting though. In addition to that, I hoped he would have had an ability to pick a power printed on his card for free to use until you choose again like some figures have. Since his dial is so over the place I thought that would have been a good and appropriate update.
